content.prompt: The trend shown in the table from 1933 to 1938 had which of the following effects on Germany?

choices.label: The Nazi party adopted anti-Semitism into its political platform.
The Nazi party was able to solidify control over German society.
The Nazi party became more hard-line anticommunist.
The Nazi party relaxed restrictions on political dissent by the late 1930s.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
